english: Can you recommend me a hotel?

papiamento: Bo por tin algun camber disponibel?
english: Do you have any rooms available?

papiamento: Bo por tin camber pa un persona?
english: Do you have a single room?

papiamento: Bo por tin camber pa dos persona?
english: Do you have a double room?

papiamento: Mi lo bay keda pa … anochi
english: I will be staying for … nights

papiamento: Mi mester un wake up call pa …
english: I need a wake up call at …

papiamento: Ki ta e ora pa check in y check out?
english: What is check in / check out time?

papiamento: Bo ta permiti pa huma den camber?
english: Do you allow smoking in the rooms?
Do you have a fitness center?

papiamento: Bo ta ofrece servicio pa camber?
Bo tin un centro pa negoshi?
english: Do you have a business center?

papiamento: Ki ta bo polisa di deposito y cancelacion
english: What is your cancellation / deposit policy?

papiamento: Bo por tin cambernan cu ta conecta?
Bo tin un fee pa Sali trempan?
english: Do you have an early departure fee?

papiamento: Ki ta e orarionan di e restaurant?
english: What are the hours of the restaurant?
